definition: to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research
ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

sentences.english: The General Political Department administrates the army's Party work and organizes and conducts its political work.
sentences.chinese: 總政治部負責管理全軍黨的工作，組織進行政治工作。
